llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Of course! Based on the information provided, here is a suggested 7-day travel itinerary for your trip from Kona to California:

Day 1 (March 10th): Kona to Los Angeles

* Fly from Kona to Los Angeles on March 10th (Flight Number 554, Price $705, DepTime 12:40, ArrTime 18:36)
* Upon arrival, check into your hotel and freshen up
* Spend the rest of the day exploring Los Angeles, visiting popular attractions such as Hollywood, Beverly Hills, and Santa Monica Beach

Day 2 (March 11th): Los Angeles to Oakland

* Take a self-driving or taxi ride from Los Angeles to Oakland (distance: 438 km, cost: $9-$43)
* Visit the Oakland Museum of California and the Chabot Space and Science Center
* Enjoy dinner at one of Oakland's many restaurants

Day 3 (March 12th): Oakland to Bakersfield

* Take a self-driving or taxi ride from Oakland to Bakersfield (distance: 438 km, cost: $9-$43)
* Visit the California Living Museum and the Kern County Museum
* Enjoy dinner at one of Bakersfield's many restaurants

Day 4 (March 13th): Bakersfield to Los Angeles

* Take a self-driving or taxi ride from Bakersfield back to Los Angeles (distance: 181 km, cost: $181-$43)
* Spend the day at leisure in Los Angeles, visiting any attractions you missed on your first day

Day 5 (March 14th): Los Angeles to Kona

* Fly from Los Angeles to Kona on March 14th (Flight Number 3583996, Price $512, DepTime 10:55, ArrTime 16:05)
* Check into your hotel in Kona and enjoy the rest of the day relaxing on the island

Day 6 (March 15th): Kona to Los Angeles

* Take a self-driving or taxi ride from Kona back to Los Angeles (distance: 2504 km, cost: $250-$705)
* Spend the day at leisure in Los Angeles, visiting any attractions you missed on your previous visits

Day 7 (March 16th): Departure from Los Angeles

* Check out of your hotel and depart Los Angeles

Total Travel Expense: Approximately $2,500 (flights, hotels, food, and transportation)

Note: The travel itinerary is just a suggestion based on the information provided. Please double-check flight schedules and availability before booking any flights or accommodations. Additionally, please consider the COVID-19 pandemic and any local travel restrictions when planning your trip.
